string-array.name: hint_as_settings
string-array.item:
"Call&SMS Filter lets you block unsolicited incoming calls and SMS messages.
To enable it, select the filtering rules (mode) and create lists of blocked and allowed contacts."

string-array.name: hint_av_settings
string-array.item:
"Anti-Virus protects your device against viruses and other malware. Anti-Virus includes the following components: Protection, Scan, and Update. You can configure the settings of each component here.
Protection detects threats and scans new applications in real time.
Scan is launched on demand and helps detect and eliminate threats on your device (such as dangerous files that have been installed or packed in archives). The scan scope can include the entire file system of the device, the contents of its internal memory or a specific folder.
Anti-Virus database and version updates ensure up-to-the-minute protection for your device."

string-array.name: hint_pp_settings
hint_at_sms_block
string-array.item:
"You can enable Device Lock to block your stolen or lost device remotely.
To lock your device remotely, send the \"lock:[code]\" SMS command from any device (where [code] is the secret code to your Kaspersky Mobile Security).
To unlock the device, enter the secret code to Kaspersky Mobile Security on the device."

string-array.name: hint_at_sms_wipe
string-array.item:
"You can select data to be remotely deleted if your device has been stolen or lost. You can delete specific data (for example, contacts, the calendar, SMS messages or folders).
To delete data remotely, send SMS command \"wipe:[code]\" to your device from any other device (where [code] - secret code to your Kaspersky Mobile Security)."

string-array.name: hint_at_sim_watch
string-array.item:
"You can enable a feature that can send you the new phone number used on the device or lock the device when the SIM card is replaced or the device is turned on without a SIM card.
To get the new phone number when the device SIM card is replaced, specify the email address or another phone number. To lock the device automatically when the SIM card is replaced or the device is turned on without a SIM card, enable the lock feature in the SIM Watch settings."

string-array.name: hint_at_sms_find
string-array.item:
"You can enable a feature that remotely detects the coordinates of your stolen or lost device.
To get the coordinates, send the \"locate:[code]\" SMS command to your device from any device (where [code] is the secret code to your Kaspersky Mobile Security). The application will send the coordinates in a return SMS message or to the email address you have specified.
To send the email, the application will send an SMS message to a dedicated number of the operator MTS (Russia). The price of the SMS sent to the dedicated number depends on the mobile rate plan. The operator MTS (Russia) will send the current phone number to your email address."

string-array.name: select_protection_mode_dialog_subtitles
string-array.item: Checks new applications and monitors operations on files.
